Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.ObjectFeature
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.GameObject
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.MovingObject
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.Hero
public class Hero extends MovingObject
A Hero is an element that is controllable by the player.
It extends MovingObject.
Hero can shoot Projectile, shield from attacks, trigger a special attack and collect Fruit for points.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      Constructor that takes unit column and rows to initialize the normal hero
      Parameters:
      world - current game world
      colNum - the column of location the unit in the game world, note this is not the exact coordinate but the relevant location of the objects without multiplying the unit size
      rowNum - the row of location the unit in the game world, note this is not the exact coordinate but the relevant location of the objects without multiplying the unit size
